description.short: A logger channel that logs its messages to a log file.

methods.name: log
methods.parameters: ofLogLevel level, const string &module, const string &message

methods.name: log
methods.parameters: ofLogLevel level, const string &module, const char *format, va_list args

methods.name: ofFileLoggerChannel
methods.parameters: const filesystem::path &path, bool append
methods.short:
Create an ofFileLoggerChannel with parameters.

Parameters:

path The file path for the log file.

append True if the log data should be added to an existing file.

methods.name: setFile
methods.parameters: const filesystem::path &path, bool append=false
methods.short:
Set the log file.

Parameters:

path The file path for the log file.

append True if the log data should be added to an existing file.

methods.name: file
methods.short: < The location of the log file.
